H3.text: when was the last time.michigan beat ohio state. 2011

A4.text: In a top-five showdown, Michigan used a dominant second half performance to beat Ohio State 42–27, giving the Wolverines their first win against the Buckeyes since 2011

A5.text: Michigan holds a 62–52–6 advantage in the all-time series, last playing in 2025 and losing for the first time since 2019
